amendment.description: To remove the use restrictions on certain land transferred to Rockingham County, Virginia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3012 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3012 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Kaine to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2150) To remove the use restrictions on certain land transferred to Rockingham County, Virginia.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3012 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3012 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Kaine to Amendment SA 2953.
